hypothesis_content.title: News-Driven Gap Breakout Fade/Follow Strategy
hypothesis_content.statement: When significant news (like GameFi malware warning) causes a gap opening beyond 2% from previous close, the initial breakout direction will reverse within 24 hours if volume doesn't sustain, but will continue if volume confirms.
hypothesis_content.rationale: News-driven gaps often overreact initially. Current GameFi news creates emotional response. Volume analysis separates panic moves from genuine trend changes. Neutral regime increases probability of mean reversion after exaggerated moves.
entry_conditions: Gap open > 2% from previous day's close on news catalyst
For reversal: volume declines by 30%+ from opening hour to hour 3
For continuation: volume remains >1.5x 10-day average through first 4 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Reversal: 1.5x the gap size | Continuation: 2x the gap size
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Break of opening hour high/low (depending on direction)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price continues in gap direction despite declining volume, or gaps fill immediately without providing trade opportunity
